HMDB_db: A cleaned version of the reference metabolomics dataset from the Human Metabolome Database (HMDB)

Source: R/Cleaned_Reference_Metabolite_Databases.R
HMDB_db.Rd

A dataset containing metabolite information from the HMDB, including chemical formulas, exact masses, isomers, InChIKeys, and names.

Usage

HMDB_db

Format

A data frame with 26190 rows and 37 variables:

formula

Chemical formula of the entity (character)

exactmass

Exact mass of the entity (numeric)

isomers

Presence of isomers (character)

isomers_inchikey

InChIKeys for isomers (character)

isomers_names

Names of isomers (character)

2M-H

Mass of the entity as a 2M-H ion (double)

2M+ACN+H

Mass of the entity as a 2M+ACN+H ion (double)

2M+ACN+Na

Mass of the entity as a 2M+ACN+Na ion (double)

2M+FA-H

Mass of the entity as a 2M+FA-H ion (double)

2M+H

Mass of the entity as a 2M+H ion (double)

2M+Hac-H

Mass of the entity as a 2M+Hac-H ion (double)

2M+K

Mass of the entity as a 2M+K ion (double)

2M+NH4

Mass of the entity as a 2M+NH4 ion (double)

2M+Na

Mass of the entity as a 2M+Na ion (double)

3M-H

Mass of the entity as a 3M-H ion (double)

M+2ACN+H

Mass of the entity as a M+2ACN+H ion (double)

M+2K+H

Mass of the entity as a M+2K+H ion (double)

M+2Na-H

Mass of the entity as a M+2Na-H ion (double)

M+ACN+H

Mass of the entity as a M+ACN+H ion (double)

M+ACN+Na

Mass of the entity as a M+ACN+Na ion (double)

M+Br

Mass of the entity as a M+Br ion (double)

M+CH3OH+H

Mass of the entity as a M+CH3OH+H ion (double)

M+Cl

Mass of the entity as a M+Cl ion (double)

M+DMSO+H

Mass of the entity as a M+DMSO+H ion (double)

M+FA-H

Mass of the entity as a M+FA-H ion (double)

M+H

Mass of the entity as a M+H ion (double)

M+Hac-H

Mass of the entity as a M+Hac-H ion (double)

M+IsoProp+H

Mass of the entity as a M+IsoProp+H ion (double)

M+IsoProp+Na+H

Mass of the entity as a M+IsoProp+Na+H ion (double)

M+K

Mass of the entity as a M+K ion (double)

M+K-2H

Mass of the entity as a M+K-2H ion (double)

M+NH4

Mass of the entity as a M+NH4 ion (double)

M+Na

Mass of the entity as a M+Na ion (double)

M+Na-2H

Mass of the entity as a M+Na-2H ion (double)

M+TFA-H

Mass of the entity as a M+TFA-H ion (double)

M-H

Mass of the entity as a M-H ion (double)

M-H2O-H

Mass of the entity as a M-H2O-H ion (double)

...

Source

https://hmdb.ca/

References

Wishart DS, et al. (2022). HMDB 5.0: The Human Metabolome Database for 2022. Nucleic Acids Res. 50(D1):D622-D631.
